198928.en:
<if_woman>Hey, hey! You're an adventurer, right? Do you
know Inspector Pakul, Pukulipo's uncle?<yesno><break><else>Hey, hey! You're an adventurer, right? Do you
know Inspector Pakul, Pukulipo's uncle?<yesno><break><endif>

198929.en:
I see. You don't know, do you... Well, then, I
don't think I can ask you to do me a favor.

198930.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Amazing. You know them, don't you? Maybe
you've even met him?<yesno><break>

198931.en:
I guess we have never met... Then, I wonder if
you would be willing to do me a favor.

198932.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I did it! I finally found the Inspector Pakul
I've been longing to meet!<bw_break>

198933.en:
Inspector Pakul is amazing! He's rumored to be solving tough cases and catching bad criminals in various towns! I came here to become his
apprentice, but I can't find him no matter how long I wait. Maybe he's somewhere else. So, I have a favor to ask you. I want you to give
Inspector Pakul the letter I wrote, asking for an apprenticeship!Inspector Pakul is amazing! He's rumored to be solving tough cases and catching bad criminals in various towns! I came here to become his
apprentice, but I can't find him no matter how long I wait. Maybe he's somewhere else. So, I have a favor to ask my brother. I want you to
give Inspector Pakul the letter I wrote to you, asking for an apprenticeship!
198933.ja:

198934.en:
Wow! You're doing it. Thank you, sis! I've been collecting rumors about Inspector Pakul, and I'll tell you the latest. He's into drinks
made with Coconuts. So, why don't you find a town nearby where you can get Coconuts that are good enough to be a specialty sold at
train stations, and visit a tavern there? I'd like to go with you, but my dad would get mad at me. Please take this letter to the Captain!Wow! You're doing it. Thank you, big brother! I've been collecting rumors about Inspector Pakul, and I'll tell you the latest. He's into
Coconut-based beverages right now. So, why don't you find a town nearby where you can get Coconuts that are good enough to be a
specialty sold at train stations, and visit a tavern there? I'd like to go with you, but my dad would get mad at me. Please take this
letter to the Captain!

198935.en: <if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Well then, I'm counting on you, sis!<else><attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Well then, I'm counting on you, big brother!<endif>

198936.en:
Wow! You're doing it. Thank you, sis! Huh? But it looks like you're full of other requests. That makes it hard for me to ask you. Will you
come again when you're free? I'll be waiting for you!Wow! You're doing it. Thank you, big brother! What is it? But you seem to be full of other requests. That makes it hard for me to ask
you. Will you come again when you're free? I'll be waiting for you!
198936.ja:

198937.en:
<if_woman><attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no? The only person I can ask is my
sister. If you change your mind, will you come
again? I'll be waiting for you!<else><attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no? The only person I can ask is my
brother. If you change your mind, will you
come again? I'll be waiting for you!<endif>
198937.ja:
ã€Œãˆãˆï½ã€€ãƒ€ãƒ¡ãªã®ï¼Ÿ ã€€é ¼ã‚ãã†ãªäººã€€ãŠå§‰ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã—ã‹ ã€€ã„ãªã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ãªã‚â€¦â€¦ã€‚

ã€Œæ°—ãŒå¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸã‚‰ã€€ã¾ãŸæ¥ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãƒœã‚¯ã€€ãšã£ã¨ã€€å¾…ã£ã¦ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‰ï¼

198938.en:
Hey, Pakul. I heard rumors that he's been popping up here and there a little bit lately. But he never comes back to this house. When am
I going to be able to go back home to collect his debt?

198940.en:
There are rumors that the Captain is now
addicted to drinks made with Cocona nut.<open_irai><bw_break>

198941.en:
So, why don't you find a town nearby where you can pick coconuts that are good enough to be sold at a train station and visit a tavern
there? I'd like to go with you, but my dad would get mad at me. Please send a letter to the Captain, asking to become his apprentice!

198942.en: <if_woman>Oh, sis. Did you find Inspector Pakul?<open_irai><bw_break><else>Oh, big brother. Did you find Inspector Pakul?<open_irai><bw_break><endif>

198943.en:
What, he broke some ornaments in a tavern in Julet Town and ran away? I wonder why he did that. But if I get the materials for the
ornaments, you can tell me where the Captain is, right? I'm sorry, but can you do that for me?

198944.en:
<if_woman>Hey, sis. Did you find out where Inspector
Pakul is?<open_irai><bw_break><else>Hey, big brother. Did you find out where
Inspector Pakul is?<open_irai><bw_break><endif>

198945.en:
What, they were headed to Royal City Kamiharmui South for questioning? I wonder. I wonder if there's some kind of incident.
Anyway, you should go to Royal City Kamiharmui South and look for the newcomer. Inspector Pakul might be there!
198945.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ãˆã£ã€‚ç‹éƒ½ã‚«ãƒŸãƒãƒ«ãƒ ã‚¤å—ã¸ ã€€è·å‹™è³ªå•ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã€€å‘ã‹ã£ãŸã‚‰ã—ã„ã£ã¦ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãªã‚“ã ã‚ã†ã€‚ä½•ã‹ã€€äº‹ä»¶ãªã®ã‹ãªã‚ã€‚
ã€Œã¨ã«ã‹ãã€€ç‹éƒ½ã‚«ãƒŸãƒãƒ«ãƒ ã‚¤å—ã«è¡Œã£ã¦ ã€€æ–°ã—ãã€€è¶Šã—ã¦ããŸã£ã¦äººã‚’ã€€æ¢ã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒ¬è­¦éƒ¨ãŒã€€ãã“ã«ã€€ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œãªã„ã‹ã‚‰ï¼

198946.en:
Now that I know more about Inspector Pakul thanks to you, I'm going to try to follow him too. I'm definitely going to become his
apprentice! That's why I came here!Now that I know more about Inspector Pakul thanks to you, I'm going to try to follow him too. I'm definitely going to become his
apprentice! That's why I came here!
198946.ja:
ã€ŒãŠå§‰ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã®ãŠã‹ã’ã§ã€€ãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒ¬è­¦éƒ¨ã®ã“ã¨ ã€€ã„ã‚ã„ã‚ã€€ã‚ã‹ã£ãŸã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ãƒœã‚¯ã‚‚ã€€è¿½ã„ã‹ã‘ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã¨æ€ã†ã‚“ã ã€‚

ã€Œãœã£ãŸã„ã€€å¼Ÿå­å…¥ã‚Šã—ã¦ã‚„ã‚‹ï¼ ã€€ãã®ãŸã‚ã«ã€€ãƒœã‚¯ã¯ã€€ã“ã“ã«ã€€æ¥ãŸã‚“ã ã‹ã‚‰ï¼ï¼

198947.en:
But, Pakul's a bastard. I can't believe he's playing with Julet and Kamiharmui. He's got a good mind, doesn't he? I've been staking out
the place all day.

199017.en:
Inspector Pakul is disguised as a priest and working on some case, right? I wanted to tell you about my apprenticeship, but I'm not going
to this time. I don't want to get in your way!
199017.ja:
ã€Œãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒ¬è­¦éƒ¨ã¯ã€€ç¥çˆ¶ã®å§¿ã«å¤‰è£…ã—ã¦ ã€€ä½•ã‹ã€€äº‹ä»¶ã®æœæŸ»ã‚’ã€€ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã‚ˆã­ï¼Ÿ
ã€Œå¼Ÿå­å…¥ã‚Šã®è©±ã‚’ã€€ã—ãŸã‹ã£ãŸã‘ã© ã€€ä»Šå›ã¯ã€€ã‚„ã‚ã¦ãŠãã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒã—ã¡ã‚ƒã£ãŸã‚‰ã€€å¤§å¤‰ã ã‹ã‚‰ã­ï¼

199018.en:
<if_woman>Oh, sis. How did you help Inspector Pakul? Did
you solve the case?<yesno><break><else>Hey, big brother. How did you help Inspector
Pakul? Did you solve the case?<yesno><break><endif>

199019.en:
I see, you haven't started yet. This one seems
to be quite a difficult case.

199020.en:
<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I see. That's Inspector Pakul and his sister!
Hey. Tell me what happened!<else><attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I see. That's Inspector Pakul and your
brother! Hey. Tell me what happened!<endif>

199021.en:
Hmmm...so you were looking for the reason why the Dwarf guy went crazy, and it might have been because he was cheating on his wife, but
it turns out that he wasn't cheating on her, he was helping the poor monster out, right? It doesn't seem like a big case, but Inspector
Pakul must have had something behind it! I knew it! He's a great inspector. I think it's time for me to get serious and go after him.
199021.ja:
ã€Œãµï½ã‚“ã€‚ãƒ‰ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã®ç”·ã®ãƒ’ãƒˆãŒ ã€€ãŠã‹ã—ããªã£ã¡ã‚ƒã£ãŸåŸå› ã‚’æ¢ã£ã¦ãŸã‚‰ ã€€æµ®æ°—ã®ã›ã„ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œãªãã¦â€¦â€¦
ã€Œã§ã‚‚ã€€ã˜ã¤ã¯ã€€æµ®æ°—ã˜ã‚ƒãªãã¦ ã€€ãã®ãƒ’ãƒˆã¯ã€€ã‹ã‚ã„ãã†ãªé­”ç‰©ã‚’ ã€€åŠ©ã‘ã¦ã‚ã’ã¦ãŸã£ã¦ã„ã†ã€€è©±ãªã‚“ã ã­ï¼Ÿ
ã€ŒãŸã„ã—ãŸäº‹ä»¶ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€€æ€ãˆã‚‹ã‘ã© ã€€ãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒ¬è­¦éƒ¨ã®ã“ã¨ã ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ãã£ã¨ã€€ä½•ã‹ ã€€è£ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã«ã€€ã¡ãŒã„ãªã„ã­ï¼
ã€Œã‚„ã£ã±ã‚Šã€€è­¦éƒ¨ã¯ã€€ã™ã”ã„ãªã‚ã€‚ ã€€ãƒœã‚¯ã‚‚ã€€ãã‚ãã‚ã€€æœ¬æ°—ã‚’å‡ºã—ã¦ ã€€è¿½ã„ã‹ã‘ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã‹ãªâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

199022.en:
This incident may not sound like much to the casual observer, but there must have been something going on behind the scenes!
Inspector Pakul is amazing after all. I think it's time for me to get serious and go after him.

199023.en:
I went to Kamiharmui, but I couldn't find Pakul's family anywhere. I was worried that I might run into the Tsubakuro family, who are
in the same business, but I didn't see them either.
199023.ja:
ã€Œã‚«ãƒŸãƒãƒ«ãƒ ã‚¤ã«ã€€è¡Œã£ã¦ã¿ãŸã‚“ã ãŒ ã€€ãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã®é‡éƒã€€ã©ã“ã‚’æ¢ã—ã¦ã‚‚ ã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚‰ãªã‹ã£ãŸãœã€‚
ã€Œã”åŒæ¥­ã®ãƒ„ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ä¸€å®¶ã¨ã€€ã‚«ã‚ªåˆã‚ã›ã¡ã¾ã£ãŸã‚‰ ã€€ã©ã†ã—ã‚ˆã†ã‹ã¨ã€€ãƒ’ãƒ¤ãƒ’ãƒ¤ã—ãŸãŒ ã€€ãã£ã¡ã¨ã‚‚ã€€ä¼šã‚ãšã˜ã¾ã„ã ã£ãŸãªã€‚

199024.en:
<pc> gave Bondor a rundown of the
case.

199112.en:
<if_woman>What is it? Are you trying to do something
Inspector Pakul asked you to do again, sis?<bw_break><else>What is it? Are you trying to do something
Inspector Pakul asked you to do again, big
brother?<bw_break><endif>

199113.en:
I can understand it somehow. I like it. I wish
I could get a favor from Inspector Pakul, too!
